Module com.application.simplyrugby
Package com.application.simplyrugby.Model

Class Player.PlayerBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.application.simplyrugby.Model.Player.PlayerBuilder
Enclosing class:
Player
public static class Player.PlayerBuilder extends Object
this Builder class will build a player object.
it is in charge of the data validation.
